description:
Once getting your CV seen by hiring manager and interview is requested "how do we stand out from there" What is the best way to approach interviews ? what you can do to stand out from the crowd. 

I will also cover the interview process from a hiring managers point of view - How can we set out a process that will allow us to attract the best talent

title: LPW2014 Rick Deller ‎PerlRick‎   ‎Recruitment in Perl   Stand out from the crowd‎ mp4 ff
